last_episode_to_air.name: The Truth
last_episode_to_air.overview: Armed with DNA evidence that links his father to the Zodiac killer, Gary forges ahead trying to uncover his truth. Meanwhile, a San Francisco based private investigator digs into Susan and Gary's claims. The questions that have haunted Gary for decades culminate in an unexpected end.

name: The Most Dangerous Animal of All
original_name: The Most Dangerous Animal of All
overview: Soon after his birth-mother contacted him for the first time, Gary L. Stewart decided to search for his biological father. His disturbing identity would force Stewart to reconsider everything he thought he knew about himself.
tagline: Searching for my father and finding the Zodiac killer.

episodes.name: My Identity
episodes.overview: Adopted as an infant, Gary L. Stewart always struggled with his identity. After 39 years, the life long search for his biological parents reveals a truth he never could have imagined.

episodes.name: The Search
episodes.overview: After learning that his father may have been the Zodiac killer, Gary brings The New York Times best-selling true crime author Susan Mustafa into the fold to help uncover more information about him. Over the next two years, they follow a dark trail filled with unexpected discoveries as Gary attempts to find some closure.

episodes.name: The Discovery
episodes.overview: Gary's story takes a turn when he realizes his book could be a betrayal of his newfound relationship with his biological mother. When Gary goes up against a community of Zodiac fanatics with ulterior motives, he reveals new information that has never been shared.

episodes.name: The Truth
episodes.overview: Armed with DNA evidence that links his father to the Zodiac killer, Gary forges ahead trying to uncover his truth. Meanwhile, a San Francisco based private investigator digs into Susan and Gary's claims. The questions that have haunted Gary for decades culminate in an unexpected end.
